title: Yatra Downloads
name: Yatra Downloads
excerpt: Allows you to add features to add additional files so that anyone can download those files from frontend. It is useful for tour operator to add brochure, tour guidelines pdf file and other costing details files, and any kind of other additional files, so that anyone can easily download those files from website frontend.

title: Yatra Services
name: Yatra Services
excerpt: This addon add features to add additional services for your tour packages. For example if you want to add cleaning and other extra services along with your tour package ( Free Services or Charged Services), this addon is useful for you. You can customize the pricing as per tour package or individual person.

title: Availability Conditions
name: Yatra Availability Conditions
excerpt: This addon add features to add different types of conditional logic for your tour packages. For example if you want to make available for booking the tour package for weekend only or each sunday only or each month only, then this addon is for you.

title: Partial Payment
name: Yatra Partial Payment
excerpt: This addon can be useful if you want to get amount partially from traveler. You can set how much money do you want to as deposit on percentage and you can simply use any of the payment gateway. Right now you can add first payment as deposit and remaining user can pay by themselves via any of the payment gateway.

title: Yatra Stripe
name: Yatra Stripe
excerpt: This is payment gateway of stripe.com which support different types of credit/debit cards. While booking the tour package on yatra plugin the traveller no need to go any of the payment gateway pages to pay the tour price. Any one can easily book the tour package via this premium payment gateway addon.

title: Yatra 2Checkout
name: Yatra Stripe
excerpt: This is payment gateway of 2checkout.com which support different types of credit/debit cards. While booking the tour package on yatra plugin the traveller no need to go any of the payment gateway pages to pay the tour price. Any one can easily book the tour package via this premium payment gateway addon.

title: Yatra Authorize.net
name: Yatra Authorize.net
excerpt: This is payment gateway addon for Yatra plugin. This is a gateway of authorize.net. This gateway will support different types of credit/debit cards. Any one can book the tour package with their credit/debit card.

title: Review & Rating
name: Yatra Review & Rating
excerpt: Yatra Review and rating is premium extension of Yatra WordPress Travel booking plugin. This extension is useful if you want to enable review and rating feature on your tour packages.

title: Yatra Square
name: Yatra Square
excerpt: Square Payment Gateway Premium extension for Yatra WordPress Plugin. It supports different cards & bank payments.

title: Yatra Razorpay
name: Yatra Razorpay
excerpt: Razorpay Payment Gateway Premium extension for Yatra WordPress Plugin. It supports different cards & bank payments.
